<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Supernatural Senses](/Feats.aspx?ID=5822) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=680" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 78 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Acute Scent](/Feats.aspx?ID=5812) or [scent](/Rules.aspx?ID=2412)

</column>

---

Your scent is preternaturally sharp, and you can always rely on your sense of smell to help guide you when your vision is compromised. When you target a [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=62) or [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=79) opponent while you are raging, you reduce the DC of the flat check to 3 for a concealed target or to 9 for a hidden one.
